author: Lao Tzu
message: If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: The world makes way for the man who knows where he is going.
title: Thought of the day

author: Napoleon Hill
message: When your desires are strong enough you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Adams
message: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
title: Thought of the day
